parameter.name: config_10_2
parameter.label: 10: Activate / deactivate ALL ON/ALL OFF
parameter.description:
Activate / deactivate ALL ON/ALL OFF

Overview

Flush PWM thermostat module responds to commands ALL ON / ALL OFF that may be sent by the main controller or by other controllers belonging to the system.

options.option: ALL ON is not active / ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON is not active / ALL OFF is active
ALL ON is active / ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON is active / ALL OFF is active

parameter.name: config_11_2
parameter.label: 11: I1 Functionality selection
parameter.description: I1 Functionality selection

options.option: Input I1 changes the mode between Off and Heat/Cool
Input I1 influences the heating/cooling valves
Input I1 doesnt influence on the Heat/Cool process

parameter.name: config_12_2
parameter.label: 12: I2 Functionality selection
parameter.description:
I2 Functionality selection

Overview

0-990 - Temperature setpoint from 0,0 to 99,0 °C
1001-1150 - Temperature setpoint -0.1 to -15°C
2000 - Input I2 influences on the cooling value according to the status of condense sensor.

options.option: Input I2 influences the cooling value with condense sensor
Input I2 doesnt influence on the Heat/Cool process

parameter.name: config_13_2
parameter.label: 13: I3 Functionality selection
parameter.description: I3 Functionality selection

options.option: Input I3 changes the mode between Heat and Cool

Input I3 doesnt influence on the Heat/Cool process

parameter.label: 40: Power reporting in Watts on power change
parameter.description:
Power reporting in Watts on power change

Overview

0 - reporting disabled
1-100 = 1%-100% Reporting enabled
Power report is send only when actual power in Watts in real time changes for more then that set percentage

parameter.description:
Antifreeze

Overview

Set value means at which temperature the thermostat will be turned on even if the thermostat was manually set off
0-127 = 0..12.7°C
1001-1127 = -0.1..-12.6°C
255 = Antifreeze is disabled
